title: Sports: Olympics (Usefulness 1-5)
description: Traveler usefulness 1-5/10 phrases for the Olympics subcategory within Sports. Includes 1 card(s).

cards.english: She gave a great performance at the Olympics.
cards.romaji: Kanojo wa Orinpikku de katsuyaku shita.
cards.japanese: 彼女はオリンピックで活躍した。
